text: Walger is a German surname.Heraldrysinstitute.com: WalgerNamespedia.com: Walger Notable people with the surname include: *Dennis Walger (born 1984), German international rugby union player *Markus Walger (born 1979), German international rugby union player *Sonya Walger (born 1974), English actress == See also == *Walgerbach, river of district Marburg-Biedenkopf in Hesse, Germany ==References== Category:German-language surnames
title: Walger
